title: 100s of SpaceX Starships land on Mars after a 6 month journey. 1000s of Martian colonists being building Mars Base 1
tuit: You want to wake up in the morning and think the future is going to be great - and that’s what being a spacefaring civilization is all about. It’s about believing in the future and thinking that the future will be better than the past. And I can’t think of anything more exciting than going out there and being among the stars

title: I'm so proud to see the impact Rare Beauty is making in the beauty industry. #RareBeauty
tuit: Every day, I'm blown away by the love and support we receive. Thank you to everyone who has been a part of this journey!  Rare Beauty is more than just a makeup brand. It's a community that celebrates inclusivity and self-expression. I'm excited for what's to come! #RareBeauty

title: What's your favorite way to sweat? #WorkoutMotivation
tuit: Feeling energized after a morning Pilates session! There's nothing like starting the day with a good workout. Movement is medicine. Whether you're a yogi, a runner, or a Pilates lover, keep moving and keep challenging yourself. The possibilities are endless! #FitnessGoals #Lululemon
